a: Of course! The Figicons CLI & package will be free and open source forever.

q: Can I import my own icons?
a: Yep! Apart from the default icons, you can add your own ones that you've designed in Figma. Check the 'Custom Icons' section to learn more.
For now at least. Currently Figicons only support a direct integration with Figma due to the ease of their API platform.
The Designer Pack is a downloadable folder containing all the default icons in SVG format. The aim of it is just for designers to be able to use the out-of-the-box icons in their designs.
Yes. Figicons cleans all stroke properties from imported icons and adds a unified style over them, which you can later override.
Nope! Your icons are safe with you when you build them on your machine, nothing gets sent to us. We don't even have servers.
Not yet, however there are plans to support a platform with team functionality to automate importing custom icons from Figma to direct usage in code.
